description: Devcontainer setup with Lakekeeper REST catalog and MinIO storage for local Iceberg Explorer development.

userStories.title: Create devcontainer scaffolding
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a devcontainer structure so I can launch the environment with one command.
acceptanceCriteria: Add `.devcontainer/` directory with `devcontainer.json` and `docker-compose.yml`
Devcontainer mounts the repo workspace with correct path
Devcontainer references the docker-compose services
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Configure Python development container
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Python 3.14 container with uv so I can run Iceberg Explorer locally.
acceptanceCriteria: Devcontainer uses a Python 3.14 base image
uv is installed and available in the container
Dependencies install via `uv sync --all-extras` during container setup
Iceberg Explorer can start with `uv run iceberg-explorer` inside the container
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add MinIO storage service
userStories.description: As a developer, I want MinIO running so Iceberg tables have S3-compatible storage.
acceptanceCriteria: Docker compose defines MinIO service with ports 9000 and 9001
MinIO root credentials are configured via environment variables
A default bucket is created on startup
MinIO has a healthcheck for readiness
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add Lakekeeper REST catalog with Postgres
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Lakekeeper REST catalog backed by Postgres so Iceberg Explorer can connect locally.
acceptanceCriteria: Docker compose defines Postgres service for Lakekeeper metadata
Docker compose defines Lakekeeper REST catalog service
Lakekeeper is configured to use the Postgres backend
Lakekeeper is configured to use MinIO as its storage endpoint
Lakekeeper has a healthcheck for readiness
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Wire Iceberg Explorer to local services
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Iceberg Explorer preconfigured to connect to Lakekeeper and MinIO.
acceptanceCriteria: Devcontainer sets `ICEBERG_EXPLORER_CONFIG` or env vars for local catalog
Catalog endpoint points to the Lakekeeper REST service
S3 endpoint points to MinIO with local credentials
No manual configuration is required after container start
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Seed demo namespaces and tables
userStories.description: As a developer, I want seeded Iceberg data so I can test the UI immediately.
acceptanceCriteria: Add a seeding script runnable in the devcontainer
Script creates at least 2 namespaces
Each namespace includes at least 2 tables with sample data
Seeding is idempotent and safe to rerun
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Verify end-to-end devcontainer startup
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the entire stack to start cleanly so I can query seeded data right away.
acceptanceCriteria: All services report healthy before Iceberg Explorer starts
Seeded data is visible in the Iceberg Explorer catalog browser
Sample tables can be queried successfully
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
